DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : External-beam radiation therapy use high-energy x-ray kill tumor cell . Implant radiation therapy use radioactive material place directly near tumor kill tumor cell . Giving external-beam radiation therapy implant radiation therapy surgery may kill tumor cell remain surgery . Sometimes , surgery , tumor may need treatment progress . In case , observation may sufficient . It yet know whether radiation therapy effective observation give surgery treat stage I endometrial cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial study external-beam radiation therapy implant radiation therapy see well work compare observation treat patient undergone surgery stage I endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: External-Beam Radiation Therapy Compared With Vaginal Brachytherapy After Surgery Stage I Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare rate 5-year locoregional relapse patient undergo external-beam radiotherapy vaginal brachytherapy v observation surgery stage I endometrial cancer . - Compare 5-year rate distant metastases patient . - Determine overall survival rate patient . - Determine prognostic factor relapse morbidity . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo either vaginal brachytherapy external-beam radiotherapy . - Arm II : Patients observe undergo treatment . After completion study treatment , patient follow approximately 83 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 400 patient accrue study .
